name: fuzzy-files
description: Quickly find and take an action over project files

ignoredNames.title: List of ignore glob patterns
ignoredNames.description: Files and directories matching these patterns are ignored. This list is merged with the list defined by the core `Ignored Names' configuration setting.

insertSep.title: Type of separator in file paths
insertSep.description: Type of separator for the file path when copying or pasting.

autocompletePath.title: Enable path autocomplete
autocompletePath.description: Enable autocomplete paths in the text editor. To call the hint type `///`.

showKeystrokes.title: Enable keystroke hints
showKeystrokes.description: Show info message with keystroke in lists.
